0.Pros: All about fun and meeting new people...

2.Pros: I liked the flexible hours and that it didnt matter if I was late sometimes. I enjoyed the people that make up the crew and the fast paced environment.
2.Cons: They run you into the ground. Expect you to do all for them but they rarely do things to help you out. Its hard to get raises and you are usually understaffed because of these reasons. Also the meanest customers I have ever encountered in my life.

3.Pros: Very flexible schedule. Fun crew and managers. Provides an amazing place to learn and manage stress and micro manage all in all it’s quite the learning experience
3.Cons: When you do your job there and do it well you really don’t feel like your being paid enough for the things you do and have to deal with. There also aren’t all that many bennifits

4.Pros: Great scheduling, easy staff to work with

5.Pros: Easy to learn , nice first job, most employees here can speak Spanish.
5.Cons: Can get very tedious and monotonous, a big reason why I left.

6.Pros: I was a teenager and it was a fun way to make spending money for myself. I think it would be difficult to live on the wage for a living, but it was a good high school part-time job. I liked working in the drive thru.
6.Cons: The environment could often be stressful. It was not the most sanitary as well. I had a significantly negative experience with a manager and had to get things worked out.

7.Pros: You get a free lunch there and you get to meet many nice people

8.Summary: "McDonalds -great for a first time job only"
8.Pros: It is a good way for teens to gain experience with customer service and to learn multiple responsibilities.
8.Cons: Speed overrides customer satisfaction. Conversely, saving costs forces management to keep the number of employees to a bare minimum. Since a minimum number of employees is forced to take and fill orders, customers are often dissatisfied and they frequently complain. When employees respond with, at best, a nonchalant attitude, it produces a vicious cycle of dissatisfaction between customer and employees.

9.Summary: "Good place to work of da munt"
